item.title: Running Elasticsearch on AWS Elastic Beanstalk
item.description: TL;DR code on github @ pfeilbr/Elastic-Beanstalk-Dockerrun.aws.json-Example This article will show you the steps to run elasticsearch on AWS Elastic Beanstalk. This example uses the elasticsearch docker image as an example. Once running you can visit http://<beanstalk domain>/?pretty an you will see the root elastic search JSON response. Initial Deployment Modify Dockerrun.aws.json for your needs. Dockerrun.aws.json reference Commit changes to repo $ git commit -a -m "changes" ``
